item.title: Dinner
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: We had dinner with some Recipezaar members last night at The Ruins: GinnyP, MeanChef and Ginny's husband, Michael, and another couple who were friends of Ginny & Michael. I believe this is the first time we've ever met Recipezaar members in person. Ginny & Michael were nice enough to treat us all to dinner (which must have been very expensive!).
